definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel
well-off and respected (idiom)/to be content with one's wealth and position
to care nothing for worldly fame and glory (idiom)

sentences.english: There is an abasement because of glory: and there is one that shall lift up his head from a low estate.
sentences.chinese: 有的屈辱来自尊荣，但也有人从卑微中抬起了头。

sentences.english: And the king said, What honour and dignity hath been done to Mordecai for this?
sentences.chinese: 王说，末底改行了这事，赐他什么尊荣爵位没有。

sentences.english: He who pursues righteousness and love finds life, prosperity and honor.
sentences.chinese: 追求公义仁慈的，就寻得生命，公义和尊荣。

sentences.english: Our calling, is to worship, honor and serve God.
sentences.chinese: 我们所受的呼召，乃是去敬拜尊荣，事奉神。

sentences.english: Fellowship with Christ is so honourable that the sorest sorrow is a light price by which to procure it.
sentences.chinese: 与基督相交是尊荣的，若将之视为廉价是最伤主的心。

sentences.english: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.
sentences.chinese: 追求公义仁慈的，就寻得生命，公义，和尊荣。

sentences.english: Come and enjoy the most honorable hospitality, courtesy and entertainment in Gentle Hot Spring Golf Club.
sentences.chinese: 南中国最尊荣的款待，尽在嘉和城温泉高尔夫球会。

sentences.english: Deck thyself now with majesty and excellency; and array thyself with glory and beauty.
sentences.chinese: 你要以荣耀庄严为妆饰，以尊荣威严为衣服。

sentences.english: However, the mansion alone honor, and not promote home ownership in the statue identity.
sentences.chinese: 然而，仅凭尊荣豪宅，亦无法彰显居者的尊显身份。

sentences.english: Humility and the fear of the Lord bring wealth and honor and life.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏耶和华心存谦卑，就得富有，尊荣，生命为赏赐。

sentences.english: Wealth and honor come from you; you are the ruler of all things.
sentences.chinese: 丰富尊荣都从你而来，你也治理万物。

sentences.english: And thou shalt put some of thine honour upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may be obedient.
sentences.chinese: 又将你的尊荣给他几分，使以色列全会众都听从他。

sentences.english: And Haman answered the king, For the man whom the king delighteth to honour.
sentences.chinese: 哈曼就回答说，王所喜悦尊荣的人。

sentences.english: Like tying a stone in a sling is the giving of honor to a fool.
sentences.chinese: 将尊荣给愚昧人的，好像人把石子包在机弦里。

sentences.english: Glory and honour are in his presence; strength and gladness are in his place.
sentences.chinese: 有尊荣和威严在他面前，有能力和喜乐在他圣所。

sentences.english: And the king said unto him, What shall be done unto the man whom the king delighteth to honour?
sentences.chinese: 王问他说，王所喜悦尊荣的人，当如何待他呢。

definition: special favor from a ruler/Emperor's generosity towards a favorite
glory, splendor, wealth and rank (idiom); high position and great wealth
